topic.title: Customizing Author Mode Through CSS Styling

body.p: Author editing mode supports most CSS 2.1 selectors, numerous CSS 2.1 properties, and some CSS 3 selectors. also supports stylesheets coded with the LESS dynamic stylesheet language. Also, some custom functions and properties that extend the W3C CSS specification and are useful for URL and string manipulation are available for developers who customize Author mode through custom frameworks.
